Question
========
Where is the YAML front matter located in a Quarto document?

Answerlist
----------
* At the end of the document inside a code chunk
* At the very top, enclosed by `---` lines
* In a separate `.yml` file only
* In the middle of the Markdown body

Solution
========
YAML front matter appears at the top of the file between `---` lines.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
